ğŸŸ¢ ç»„ä»¶å†…éƒ¨ç§æœ‰çš„æ•°æ®

class State1 extends React.Component {
  state = { count: 0 }
  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <h1>countï¼š{this.state.count}</h1>
      </div>
    )
  }

# setState()

# äº‹ä»¶ç»‘å®šthis

class State1 extends React.Component {
  state = { count: 0 }
  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <h1>countï¼š{this.state.count}</h1>
        <button
          onClick={() => {
            this.setState({
              count: this.state.count + 1
            })
          }}
        >
          +1
        </button>
      </div>
    )
  }
}

æŠŠä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘æŠ½ç¦»å•ç‹¬å‡½æ•°

class State1 extends React.Component {
  state = { count: 0 }
  onIncrement = () => {
    this.setState({
      count: this.state.count + 1
    })
  }
  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <h1>countï¼š{this.state.count}</h1>
        <button onClick={this.onIncrement}>+1</button>
      </div>
    )
  }
}
